metadata.title: CVE-2017-0665 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Android framework. Product:Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2.Android ID: A-36991414.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
android-framework-23 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
